name: RPG Maker VX Ace - COSMIC MUSIC DLC PACK
detailed_description:
■Cosmic Music DLC Pack■

Delve into the hidden treasures concealed within the Cosmic Music DLC Pack featuring unused music from Virgo Vs The Zodiac composed by Elektrobear.
Let your players be swept away by the immensity of the galaxy as they are taken on a journey through the Zodiac constellations in this music pack of cosmic quality.

In the first half of the pack, an assortment of pianos and string instruments combine with synth soundscapes,
from Electra's energetic synths through to Sadabchia where you can feel yourself be embraced by the cold clash of pianos and synthwave.

Zosma follows this up with a more traditional sound carried by violins and cellos, as well as an assortment of other stringed instruments.
Propus features pounding dark drum sounds and distorted cellos underlining it as the tension ramps which leads into Iota Librae, a song fit for bossfights,
starting with a soft piano that grows into a choir closing it up with a guitar fueled melody.


This pack contains a total of 7 songs (and a special bonus track) to engulf your space travel!
Ogg, mp3,m4a formats included.

  • 1 - Electra: A energetic and hopeful song, good for creating a hype mood.
  • 2 - Auva: A soft soundscape of mysterious synths and pianos.
  • 3 - Ascella: Good for those moments of chill.
  • 4 - Sadabchia: Piano clashes against cold synths in this emotional song.
  • 5 - Zosma: String instruments combine to create a dramatic atmosphere.
  • 6 - Propus: Under threat by an unknown terror, useful for moments of tension or bossfights
  • 7 - Iota Librae: Clashing amongst the stars, perfect for a dramatic bossfight

[[BONUS TRACK]]
  • BONUS - Sargas: Bonus track featuring a throbbing bassline and a hopeful piano lead.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS:Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista / 7 (32-bit/64-bit)
  • Processor:Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor
  • Memory:512 MB RAM
  • Graphics:1024 x 768 pixels or higher desktop resolution
  • Hard Drive:400 MB HD space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor:Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor
  • Memory:512 MB RAM
